chat.defaultPrompt: You are a helpful AI assistant

llm.frequencyPenaltyExp: Positive values (e.g., 1.0): Suppress repetition of high-frequency words to make output more diverse and avoid mechanical repetition. Negative values (e.g., -1.0): Allow more repetition, suitable for texts requiring emphasis or fixed expressions.
llm.label: Model Configuration
llm.maxTokensExp: Maximum output tokens. Different models may support different amounts.
llm.presencePenaltyExp: Positive values (e.g., 1.0): Encourage the model to mention new content, avoid staying on discussed topics, suitable for open-ended conversations or exploratory texts. Negative values (e.g., -1.0): Allow the model to focus on current topics, reduce jumping, suitable for in-depth discussions or coherent narratives.
llm.streamExp: Whether the model outputs in a stream.
llm.temperatureExp: Higher values make output more random and diverse; lower values make output more stable. It's recommended to adjust either temperature or top_p, not both simultaneously.
llm.topPExp: Higher values allow more possibilities; lower values keep only the highest probability candidates. Not recommended to modify together with temperature.

settings.label: Settings
settings.maxContextLengthExp: Maximum number of message contexts to carry in a request.

tti.guidanceScaleExp: This value controls how closely the generated image matches the given prompt. Higher values make the image adhere more strictly to the text prompt. Lower values make the image more creative and diverse, potentially containing more unexpected elements.
tti.label: Image Generation Config

embedding.deleteWithKnowledgeBind: This embedding model is bound to {count} knowledge base(s) and cannot be deleted. Knowledge base(s): {name}
embedding.name: Name

error.messageNotInTopic: User message does not belong to the current chat

form.stringFieldNotNull: This field is required and cannot be empty

knowledge.maxFileChunksDesc: When splitting a file into chunks, specify the maximum number of chunks. If exceeded, the file will be truncated.
knowledge.maxInputsDesc: When splitting a file into multiple chunks for embedding, specify the number of chunks to batch request per API call.
knowledge.maxTokensDesc: When splitting a file into multiple chunks for embedding, the maximum tokens per chunk.
knowledge.name: Name
knowledge.restartRagEmbedding: Reprocessing will re-read files and overwrite old data.

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
